GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
riscv: process: fix kernel info leakage

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit cc36c7fa5d9384602529ba3eea8c5daee7be4dbc, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 7db91e57a0acde126a162ababfb1e0ab190130cb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: riscv: process: fix kernel info leakage
